text:
{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>
  5. Bey Herrn Daniel Eckenstein dem Buchdrucker in der Eschemer-Vorstatt sind folgende Bücher zu haben:
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Dr. Johann Rambach</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Erbauliches Hand-Büchlein für Kinder</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Johann Arndt</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Sechs geistreiche Bücher vom wahren Christenthum</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>deßelben</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Geistreiches Paradys-Gärtlein</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Johann-Hähner</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Zweymahl zwey und fünffzig auserlesene biblische Historien aus dem Alten und Neuen Testament</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Der Gnaden-Schlüssel aller Kinderen Gottes</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Die Wege und Werke Gottes in der Seele</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Übungen sich stets in der Gegenwart Gottes zu halten</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":18,"explanation":"1. Replaced garbled encoding (e.g. “B√Ächer”) with correct German umlauts (Bücher, Büchlein, für etc.). 2. Normalised ‘8v√¢≤’ to standard “8vo”. 3. Added missing line-breaks and indentation for readability (XML-whitespace neutral). 4. Removed stray punctuation that lay outside the element structure and inserted it as surrounding text where relevant. 5. Added a separate <FORMAT> element to the Arndt entry which lacked one. 6. Closed every element properly and ensured no tag nesting errors occurred. 7. Added an <AUTHOR> element (“deßelben”) that was originally present as plain text. 8. Capitalisation corrected in several titles to match original orthography. 9. Ensured only legal XML characters remain (no un-escaped “&”, “<”, “>”). 10. Provided a single, well-formed top-level <ITEM> element containing all <BIBL> children."}
